verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The splendor of a King, clothed in majesty, newline Let all the earth rejoice, all the earth rejoice, newline he wraps himself in light, newline and darkness tries to hide newline and trembles at his voice, trembles at his voice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: How Great is our God, sing with me, newline How great is our God, all will see newline How great, how great is our God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Age to age he stands, and time is in his hands, newline beginning and the end, beginning and the end. newline The godhead, three in one: father, spirit, and son newline The lion and the lamb, the lion and the lamb

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Name above all Names newline Worthy of all Praise newline and My heart will sing newline How Great Is Our God
